title: Chana Masala
description: A hearty chickpea curry cooked with tomatoes, onions, and aromatic Indian spices.
instructions: Heat oil in a pot and add cumin seeds. Let them crackle to release their aroma.
Add chopped onions and saut√© until soft and lightly golden.
Stir in ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, coriander powder, and salt. Cook until the tomatoes break down into a thick sauce.
Add the cooked chickpeas and mix well to coat them with the masala paste.
Pour in 1 cup of water and bring to a gentle boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in garam masala, cook for 2 more minutes, and adjust seasoning if needed.
